name: Hexahedral
summary: Hexahedral is a cuboid, challeging, 3D platformer, physics based, puzzle game with specific mechanics and surreal atmosphere, where you need to understand how your movement works and use your abilities to your favor to reach as high as you can. This game is intentionally difficult and confusing at some points, though the mechanics are pretty simple, once you learn how to move propperly, you will notice it isn't enough for you to overcome it, you must as well have patience and be persistent, then you may be able to reach the end. This journey depends completly on you, so don't give up, and remember, it can always get worse.
